description:
A sample showing how to use the USD integration in Timeline.

UsdTimelinePlayable Sample:
	1. Open the "UsdTimelinePlayable.unity" scene
	2. Make sure the Unity Window, "Timeline" is open and visible
		2.1. Window -> Sequencing -> Timeline
	3. Within the Scene Hierarchy window, select "TimelineDirector"
	4. Notice in "Timeline" window, their is a "Usd Playable Track" with "testRecording"
	5.Play the timeline.
